All services are currently back online, and any customers still experiencing issues should contact us at 1-888-472-2222, or by chat at https://www.shaw.ca/contact-us/.
As our technicians continue to repair the failure, there may be momentary loss of service later this evening
Due to the complexity of this outage, our technicians are still working to resolve. Thank you for your patience.
